page.title: 07 - RECREATION (2)
page.content:
Many houses have larger than average gardens, and gardening is a very obvious and time consuming recreation for some.
Duncton has an active WI ( Womens Institute ) group, which meets once a month in the village hall.
The area is very popular with Ramblers, being close to the South Downs and its famous footpath, the South Downs Way, see "TRANSPORT".
On the whole the area supports those recreational activities that the people actually want, with no obvious attempt to provide sophisticated facilties for the minority, as is common in built-up areas
